organizations.name: network technical architect - trump trainers & consultants pvt ltd.

text:
job title, keywords or company city or state Trump Trainers & Consultants Pvt Ltd. - Pune, Maharashtra 
Senior Network – Technical Architect 
Exp : 12-17yrs 
Job location : Pune 
Responsible for designing fit for purpose Network Solutions to support the business objectives of the company and its extensive customer base. 
Network TDA"s are required to collaborate with business stake-holders and customer representatives to understand and translate business requirements, into appropriate technical solutions to meet both business and commercial needs. Candidates are expected to have demonstrable, large-scale Network Architecture experience, combined with good consulting skills and an understanding of how network technologies impact on...and are impacted by other IT infrastructure technologies. 
Key Attributes: 
*Be able to translate customer business/technology requirements that can vary in detail and produce high quality network solutions, at both high and low levels of detail. 
*Be able to deliver designs to defined standards, often against challenging timescales. 
*Provide input to technical designs provided by other ITS technology groups - a level of 'cross-functional' technical knowledge is highly desirable. 
*Provide direct, credible and authoritative interaction with ITS colleagues and customers alike. *Actively contribute to continual service delivery improvement. 
*Act as a SME and mentor to more junior Network Engineering staff. 
Essential Capability level: 
*Candidates will be expected to have achieved accreditation to CCIE level (or Juniper equivalent) and may possess a combination of the following: oCisco CCNA/CCDA oCheckpoint CCSA oCisco CCNP/CCDP accredited oCheckpoint CCSE accredited oCisco CCIE or JNCIP/JNCIE 
Should have good experience in design and implementation. 
Should have work experience in routers, switches, load balancer and checkpoint firewalls on ISP / Enterprise networking. 
*Good standard of General Education. 
*Current SC Clearance preferable (or, employee will be submitted for, and expected to attain Security Clearance (SC) classification) 
Desired Experience/Skills: 
*Candidates with specialism"s in Network Security, Cisco UCS or with experience in the design of large scale WAN/ISP environments are of particular interest. 
Personal Attributes: 
*A team player with excellent customer facing skills. 
*Works well under pressure. 
*A flexible approach to working hours. 
*Good Oral and written skills. 
*Willing to work away from home as business needs require. 
*Be able to work under minimum supervision.
